sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: A standard deck of cards contains 52 cards. What is the probability of drawing a queen of hearts from the deck on the first draw?
message_2: There is only 1 queen of hearts in a standard deck of 52 cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing a queen of hearts on the first draw is 1/52 or approximately 0.0192 or 1.92%.
